alert.note: Alert for Clay; Oktibbeha; Webster (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 29 at 5:29PM CST until November 29 at 5:45PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CST FOR NORTHERN OKTIBBEHA...EAST CENTRAL WEBSTER AND WESTERN CLAY COUNTIES... At 529 PM CST, a confirmed tornado was located over Maben, or 13 miles southwest of Montpelier, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornado will be near... Pheba around 540 PM CST. Griffith around 550 PM CST. Pala Alto and Muldrow around 600 PM CST. West Point around 605 PM CST. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
